attributes.additional_details: Murray walker is Formula one more than any other individual. He has epitomized the Formula one fans and the sport. His long service to motorsport and the viewing public should be recognised in a way that does him a credit and recognises not only what he has brought to the sport but also to British broadcasting. Therefore I ask others to join me in asking her Majestys government to award a knighthood to one of the most entertaining and positive broadcasters in British broadcasting history.
